Name: Wonder Room
Effect: Target the Battlefield. Everyone on the Battlefield will have their Defense and Sp. Defense calculated with Insight instead of Vitality. If using Insight as Sp. Defense optional rule, swap the calculation. Duration 4 Rounds.
Description: Inside the Wonder Room, a strong mind makes a strong body and a resilient body makes a resilient mind. However, if the mind is weak, the body will be weak and vice-versa.
